mapper.sql: SELECT BOARD_QNA_ID, BOARD_QNA_TITLE, BOARD_QNA_TXT, BOARD_QNA_DATE, MEMBER_ID FROM BOARD_QNA
mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_QNA_ID, b.BOARD_QNA_TITLE, b.BOARD_QNA_TXT, b.BOARD_QNA_DATE, b.MEMBER_ID, c.COMMENT_QNA_ID, c.COMMENT_QNA_TXT, c.COMMENT_QNA_DATE, c.ADMIN_ID FROM BOARD_QNA b, COMMENT_QNA c WHERE b.BOARD_QNA_ID =c.BOARD_QNA_ID(+)

SELECT b.BOARD_QNA_ID, b.BOARD_QNA_TITLE, b.BOARD_QNA_TXT, b.BOARD_QNA_DATE, b.MEMBER_ID, c.COMMENT_QNA_ID, c.COMMENT_QNA_TXT, c.COMMENT_QNA_DATE, c.ADMIN_ID FROM BOARD_QNA b, COMMENT_QNA c WHERE b.BOARD_QNA_ID =c.BOARD_QNA_ID(+) AND b.MEMBER_ID = #{value}
